text: wing their favoritism of these groups by purposely influencing the developing cultures to adopt the ________________________ 1. Some historical reference sources suggest that Akhenaton reigned from 1353-1335 BC and place Tutankhamon’s reign from 1333-1323 BC. Speakers from the Sirian Council provided the dates 1370—1353 BC for Akhenaton’s reign and 1340-1331 BC for Tut- ankhamon; they request that I leave the dates as they have given. I cannot personally attest to the accuracy of either set of dates. 96
